channel.title: Why isn't the granulator working?
channel.description:
> incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1 > Generate code complete > Start compiling patch > Compiling patch... with /Applications/Axoloti.app/Contents/Java/firmware > BDIR = /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build > FIRMWARE = . > RM > APP > ! /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch > . /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/objects/osc/brds/brds_digital.h > . /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/axoloti-factory/objects/osc/brds/brds_analog.h > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp: In member function 'void rootc::instancegranulator__1::dsp(bool, bool, int32_t, int32_t, int32_t, int32_t (&)[16], int32_t&)': > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:684:59: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int table_index = __USAT(inlet_position,27)>>(27-parent->instance_i.LENGTHPOW); > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:726:26: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y1 = parent->instance_i.array[table_index&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:726:63: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y1 = parent->instance_i.array[table_index&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:726:95: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y1 = parent->instance_i.array[table_index&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:727:29: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y2 = parent->instance_i.array[(table_index+1)&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:727:70: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y2 = parent->instance_i.array[(table_index+1)&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > /Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.cpp:727:102: error: 'class rootc' has no member named 'instance_i' > int32_t y2 = parent->instance_i.array[(table_index+1)&parent->instance_i.LENGTHMASK]<<parent->instance_i.GAIN; > ^ > make: *** [/Users/xe1ex/Documents/axoloti/build/xpatch.bin] Error 1 > shell task failed, exit value: 2 > Compiling patch failed ( untitled )
any ideas why it might not be going through?

item.title: Why isn't the granulator working?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

mutronic:

incomplete object reference attribute in granulator_1

There is an object in your patch, "granulator_1", that expects a (named) reference to another object. I guess it is a js/granulator object, this object needs a reference to the name of a table in the "table" attribute.

Read full topic
